newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico stock electronic trade data to be released.
newsitem.headline: Mexico stock electronic trade data to be released.

text.p: The Mexican stock exchange will release prices from electronic trading at 1030 local time/1130 EDT/1530 GMT, a bolsa spokesman said Wednesday.
"It's confirmed, at 1030 the system will be freed for consultation," a bolsa spokesman told Reuters, meaning that electronic stocks trade data would be made public.

Floor trading has been delayed since the normal 0830 local time opening bell because about 200 protesters blocked the main entrances to the stock exchange building. Electronic trade started on time, but prices were not released "because there is no organized market," the spokesman said.
